Title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
Actors: Woody Harrelson, Courtney Love, Edward Norton, Brett Harrelson
Plot: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 22 wins & 33 nominations.
Production: Columbia Pictures Corporation, Ixtlan Corporation, Phoenix Pictures, Illusion Entertainment
